channel.title: !Codex Forum Hosting!| Loads of Features| Ideal For P.servers| Free|
channel.description:
Hi everyone. I have Decided to Spring the surprise i have had in plan. i am making Codexonline.info A Brand New Online Community. With:
[b] Official Uploading Site! [/b] That includes: Unlimited Bandwidth, File's Hosted and upload Size.
[b] Official Codex Community [/b] Like Normal Except re-Built Starting From Now! [i] If you want to be staff, Post Here or email forum@codexonline.info [/i]
[b] Official Codex hosting Community [/b]
[b]Package 1:[/b]
Space: 250 mb Bandwidth: 3 gig
[b]Features:[/b] MySQL databases: 5 Emails: 10 FTP: 10 Sub domains: 10 Parked domains: 0 Addon domains: 1
[u] Cost: Free [/u]
[b]Package 2:[/b]
Space: 2 gig Bandwidth: 6 gig
[b]Features:[/b] MySQL databases: 10 Emails: 35 FTP: 35 Sub domains: 30 Parked domains: 0 Addon domains: 5
[u] Cost: $2.00 per month or 20 forum Posts per month [/u]
[b]Package 3:[/b]
Space: 5 gig Bandwidth: 10 gig
[b] Features [/b] MySQL databases: unlimited Emails: unlimited FTP: unlimited Sub domains: unlimited Parked domains: 5 Addon domains: 10
[u] Cost: $6.00 Per month or 75 Forum Posts per month [/u]
[b][i] We also have Custom Packages. Please PM me if you would like a custom package or Email Hosting@codexonline.info[/i][/b] to Register, Please visit: www.codexonline.info! Thanks! Ikick
